data: Nature | Cariboo | Campbell River | Boardman | Pacific
Canadian province of Cariboo | Campbell River | Boardman

One of the fairest paintings of Nature was at that point among the mountains of the Canadian province of Cariboo where the Campbell River takes the Boardman to its bosom and swings south on its pilgrimage to the Pacific.
